General.Name: TUT Fitness Group Inc
General.Description: TUT Fitness Group Inc. manufactures and sells fitness products in Canada and the United States. The company designs, patents, and manufactures portable home gyms. Its flagship products include TUT Trainer and TUT Rower equipment for home fitness. The company also offers TUT training app and accessories. It sells its products through online. TUT Fitness Group Inc. was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1055 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3P3
